fields.title: Bowing Exercise 1
fields.description: Practice picking up the bow with proper technique, placing it on the strings, and pulling it across to make a sound.

fields.title: Twinkle, Twinkle
fields.description: Practice the notes slowly, then gradually add the rhythm.

fields.title: Bowing Exercise 2
fields.description: Practice the bowing exercise as outlined in the book. Use good bow distribution and weight to produce a clear tone.

fields.title: Lightly Row
fields.description: Practice the notes slowly, then gradually add the rhythm. Focus on intonation.

fields.title: Ear Training
fields.description: Choose a favorite song with a prominent bass part, and work on learning how to play a small section of the melody by ear.

fields.title: Slap Technique Exercise
fields.description: Watch the tutorial video and play along to practice slap technique.

fields.title: Another One Bites the Dust
fields.description: Learn the song in small sections, then put it together.

fields.title: 2 Major Scales
fields.description: Choose 3 major scales of your choice to practice in 2 octaves each.
